content: 물론이지! 인스타그램 스타일에 맞게 가독성 좋게 줄바꿈한 최종 버전 이야: --- Fleeta Web Viewer launches March 31 Only for Fleet Plan users at app.fleeta.io Upgrade by May 31 and get Fleet Plan 50 OFF for 12 months 1st month FREE What's included? - Multi Live View 4 dash cams - Geofencing with alerts - 90-day GPS logs Video On Map - 15GB cloud storage per cam - Email notifications more Don t miss out claim your offer now! link Fleeta BlackVue FleetPlan Dashcam Promo FleetTracking --- 원하는 분위기에 따라 이모지나 해시태그도 조절해줄 수 있어!
